'''1.13.3''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released only for iOS and iPadOS on November 20, 2019, which fixes several crashes.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360036461291|title=Minecraft - 1.13.3 (iOS Only)|date=November 20, 2019}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixed the cause of several crashes that occurred on iOS and iPadOS.
